title: Jason Alexander (rugby union)
summary:
Jason Alexander (born on 22 September 2000) is a South African rugby union player for the Western Province in the Currie Cup. His regular position is hooker.
Alexander was named in the Western Province squad for the 2021 Currie Cup Premier Division. He made his debut for Western Province in Round 2 of the 2021 Currie Cup Premier Division against Golden Lions.
